name: Jabr Bakhtari
story: Abbas Kakar was born and raised in a small village in rural Afghanistan. He joined the Taliban at a young age but quickly became disillusioned with their tactics and values. When the opportunity arose to join the OPFOR, Abbas saw it as a chance to fight for a cause he believed in while adhering to a more honorable code of conduct. Abbas has proven to be a skilled sharpshooter, but also possesses strong leadership qualities that have earned him a promotion to Corporal within the OPFOR.
